## Uploader File Status {.unnumbered}
Clicking the "Run Code" will run the code to look at the files on the Google Drive and update the Status page. This takes a few minutes to run!


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| eval: true
generate_file_status(esr_year)
headervars=c("year","index","timeseries","metric","SEup","SElo")
status_list <- read_status(esr_year,headervars)
print(status_list$last_updated)
```
